name: Low Power RoBro
description:
Story  

You are a robot that was thrown out because you have a defective battery. To survive you must reach the battery replacement store to receive a new non-defective battery. On your journey you will find several battery boosters that will help your defective battery from running out of power. Therefore, throughout you journey to the battery replacement store you will need to collect many of these battery boosters, or you will risk dying due to your low power.

  Controls:

Move left: A or Left Arrow Key

Move right: D or Right Arrow Key

Jump: Spacebar
